channel.title: starting on LoopedLine
channel.description: Recent content in starting on LoopedLine

item.title: Beginning
item.description: Tempus Fugit Some things are heard so often that we stop hearing them. Life is short. And just because that’s cliche doesn’t make it any less true. –Richie Norton There are many truths that sound like cliches, but they remain truths. Go for it now. The future is promised to no one. –Wayne Dyer We become insensitive to the reality of an idea because we hear it so much.
